meaningMnemonic: <radical>Say</radical> it with your <radical>tongue</radical>. If you do, you'll be able to <kanji>talk</kanji>. You'll be able to <kanji>speak</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: If something uses their tongue, it will be able to <kanji>talk</kanji> and <kanji>speak</kanji>. To prove this, you teach a <reading>wa</reading>lrus (わ) to use its tongue, and lo and behold, it speaks to you!
